caption.title: Age distribution of laboratory-confirmed influenza patients infected with type B viruses belonging to the Victoria or Yamagata lineage.
caption.p: Countries which provided information on exact age for ≥50 B Victoria and ≥50 B Yamagata influenza for the whole study period cases were included. Countries were ordered according to the median age of the general population. The Global Influenza B Study, 2000–2018.
Click here for additional data file.
